title: FAHIZO Men's Dress Shirt Casual Regular Fit Stretch Soild Long Sleeve Button Up Shirts
description: 【High-quality Materials】making it durable,breathable and providing all-day comfort.

【Design and Size】The regular fit design has a generous cut through the shoulders, chest, and waist, allowing for long-lasting comfort and a modern look. These versatile shirts can be matched with dress pants, shorts, denim, chinos, and more. Size are US standard size, please choose your size according to our size chart.

【All Occasion】 Regular work day/Daily casual/Office/Vacation/Dating/Party/Wedding. This mens dress shirt is a perfect choice. It is also an ideal gift for families, friends, colleagues, and boyfriend.
【Easy Care】The fabric is well built that can hold up well after washing. It is easy to clean and can be hand wash or machine washable in low-temperature water. Can be use a warm iron if needed.
【Customer Service】Please feel free to contact with us if you have any problem about our product, we will respond and resolve your issues in a timely manner. Look forward to your choice.
